name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace USD with THB for AliExpress.com

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces US $xx.xx with xx.xx บาท for AliExpress.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Replaces USD prices with THB prices by calculating from exchange rate.
- Auto update exchange rate when browser start.
- Toggle enable/disable the extension by clicking toolbar icon.

Usage:
- Install the extension
- Set display currency on AliExpress.com to USD
- Shopping

License:
